Package model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Model Class representing a photo. A Photo has a caption, url and some set of photo tags along with a photo capture date.
    Author:
    Dev Patel and Eric Chan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Photo​(java.lang.String url)
      Constructor to create a photo with no tags and from a given file path.
      Photo​(Photo other)
      Create a photo from other photo.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Photo

        public Photo​(java.lang.String url)
        Constructor to create a photo with no tags and from a given file path.
        Parameters:
        url - Path from which photo should be picked

      • Photo

        public Photo​(Photo other)
        Create a photo from other photo. the tags are also copied for the photo along with path and caption
        Parameters:
        other - Photo to create a copy from

      • getTags

        public java.util.HashMap<Tag,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getTags()
        get the tags and their values associated on the photo It returns a list of tag values for each possible tag, all wrapped in a hashmap.
        Returns:
        Map with tags and their values

      • getTagValues

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTagValues​(Tag t)
        get the tag values for a given tag from the photo
        Parameters:
        t - Tag for which values needs to be retrieved
        Returns:
        List of tag values

      • addTag

        public void addTag​(Tag tag,
                   java.lang.String tagValue)
        Add a new tag value to the photo. if tag is single value tag then the older value is discarded.
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag to add value for
        tagValue - Tag value

      • getPhotoDate

        public java.util.Calendar getPhotoDate()
        Get the photo capture date
        Returns:
        Photo date as calendar object

      • removeTag

        public void removeTag​(Tag t,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Remove the tag with specific value from the photo.
        Parameters:
        t - Tag object to be removed
        value - Specific tag value to be removed
